tasks.name: Intro to Graphics Design Course
tasks.description: Take the 'Intro to Graphics Design' course to learn about basic design principles and tools.

tasks.name: Join Design Enthusiasts Group
tasks.description: Join the 'Design Enthusiasts' group to connect with like-minded individuals and share your work.

tasks.name: Beginner Course on Photoshop
tasks.description: Take the 'Beginner Course on Photoshop' to learn how to use the industry-standard design tool.

tasks.name: Create a Branding Logo
tasks.description: Apply your new Photoshop skills by creating a branding logo for a hypothetical company.

tasks.name: Share Progress in Design Enthusiasts Group
tasks.description: Share your logo design progress with the 'Design Enthusiasts' group to get feedback and support.

tasks.name: Advanced Motion Graphics Course
tasks.description: Take the 'Advanced Motion Graphics' course to learn how to create animated designs.

tasks.name: Develop a Motion Graphics Portfolio
tasks.description: Apply your motion graphics skills by developing a portfolio of animated designs.

tasks.name: Share Portfolio in Design Enthusiasts Group
tasks.description: Share your motion graphics portfolio with the 'Design Enthusiasts' group to get feedback and support.

tasks.name: Connect with a Graphics Design Mentor
tasks.description: Connect with a graphics design mentor, such as Jane Smith, to get personalized feedback and guidance.

tasks.name: Join Photoshop Masters Group
tasks.description: Join the 'Photoshop Masters' group to network with experienced designers and learn new tips and tricks.

tasks.name: Attend Office Hours with John Doe
tasks.description: Attend a virtual office hours session with John Doe to get personalized feedback and guidance on your designs.

tasks.name: Complete CompTIA Graphics Design Certification
tasks.description: Take the CompTIA Graphics Design Certification exam to demonstrate your mastery of graphics design skills.

tasks.name: Update Portfolio
tasks.description: Update your portfolio with your new certification and projects.
